purpose: The email announces the 9th International Conference on Information Technology & Systems (ICITS'26) to be held in Roatán Island, Honduras, from February 16-18, 2026. It invites researchers and practitioners to submit original papers in English, Spanish, or Portuguese on various topics related to Information Technology & Systems. The email outlines submission guidelines, including formatting requirements, review processes, and publication details. Important dates for paper submission, acceptance notification, and registration are also provided.

infos:
Conference on Information Technology & Systems | Roatán Island, Honduras
From: SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Reply-To:[log in to unmask]
Date:Wed, 16 Jul 2025 06:14:35 -0000
Content-Type:text/plain

ICITS'26 - 9th International Conference on Information Technology & Systems, to be held at Universidad Tecnológica de Honduras, Roatán Island, Honduras, between the 16th and the 18th of February 2026, is an international forum for researchers and practitioners to present and discuss the most recent innovations, trends, results, experiences and concerns in the several perspectives of Information Technology & Systems.
We are pleased to invite you to submit your original papers to ICITS'26.
Based on Scientific Committee evaluation, a paper can be rejected or accepted by the Conference Chairs.
The Conference can include Work Sessions where these posters are presented and orally discussed, with a 7 minute limit per poster.
The authors of accepted papers will have 15 minutes to present their work in a Conference Work Session; approximately 5 minutes of discussion will follow each presentation.

To ensure that a paper accepted as paper is published, at least one of the authors must be fully registered by the 5th of November 2025, and the paper must comply with the suggested layout and page-limit.
Payment of Registration, to ensure the inclusion of an accepted paper in the conference proceedings: November 19, 2025.

conf_name_candidates.evidence: ICITS'26 - 9th International Conference on Information Technology & Systems, to be held at Universidad Tecnológica de Honduras, Roatán Island, Honduras, between the 16th and the 18th of February 2026
